sys_update_xml.name: sys_trigger_1cd433f16f85210015244035eb3ee411
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_trigger"><sys_trigger action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><application/><calendar/><claimed_by/><document/><document_key/><error_count>0</error_count><job_context/><job_id display_value="RunScriptJob">81c92ce9c0a8016400e5f0d2f784ea78</job_id><last_error/><log>false</log><maintenance>false</maintenance><max_drift/><name>Share Install Logger</name><next_action>2014-01-01 23:29:16</next_action><parent/><priority>100</priority><processing_duration>0</processing_duration><repeat/><run_count>0</run_count><run_dayofmonth/><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_month>1</run_month><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_weekinmonth>1</run_weekinmonth><script>var logClient = new GlideSimpleHTTPClient('https://share.servicenow.com/installLogger.do');
var query_string = 'installed_by=' + gs.getUserName() + '&instance_name=' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '&artifact=67e0e606db10e20010c37ecfbf9619f3&content=ebe02e06db10e20010c37ecfbf961909';
gs.log('posting to: ' + query_string);
logClient.get(query_string);</script><state>0</state><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>1cd433f16f85210015244035eb3ee411</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><system_id/><trigger_class>DEFAULT</trigger_class><trigger_type>0</trigger_type></sys_trigger></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_fd1068044f970200b608a6928110c785
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GlobalSearch</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GlobalSearch</name><script><![CDATA[var GlobalSearch = Class.create();
GlobalSearch.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    }, 
    bySysId: function(sys_id){
		var tables = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
		tables.addNullQuery('super_class');
		tables.addQuery('name','DOES NOT CONTAIN', 'ts_');
	    tables.query();
	
		while(tables.next()){
			var agg = new GlideAggregate(tables.name);
			agg.addAggregate('COUNT')
			agg.addQuery('sys_id',sys_id);
			agg.query();
			
			agg.next();
			if(agg.getAggregate('COUNT') > 0)
				return tables.name;
		}
		throw "No record was found for sys_id: '"+sys_id+"'";
	},
    type: 'GlobalSearch'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-10-19 09:20:11</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>fd1068044f970200b608a6928110c785</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GlobalSearch</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fd1068044f970200b608a6928110c785</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-10-19 10:12:56</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_processor_0dc2a4444f970200b608a6928110c713
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_processor"><sys_processor action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><class_name/><description/><interactive>false</interactive><name>GlobalSearch</name><parameters/><params_endpoint/><path>GlobalSearch</path><path_endpoint/><roles/><script><![CDATA[try{
	var sys_id = g_request.getParameter("sys_id");
	var response = new GlobalSearch().bySysId(sys_id);
	g_processor.writeOutput("text/html", 
							'<script type="text/javascript">'+
							'window.location = "/nav_to.do?url='+response+
							'.do?sys_id='+sys_id+'"</script>');
}catch(e){
	g_processor.writeOutput("text/plain", response);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_processor</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-10-19 09:29:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>0dc2a4444f970200b608a6928110c713</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GlobalSearch</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_processor_0dc2a4444f970200b608a6928110c713</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-10-19 10:15:36</sys_updated_on><type>script</type></sys_processor></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_page_72a22b754f631200b608a6928110c729
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_page"><sys_ui_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>general</category><client_script/><description/><direct>false</direct><endpoint/><html><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<script type="text/javascript">
		askForSysId();

		function askForSysId(){
			var sys_id='';
			while(sys_id == '' || sys_id.length!=32){
				  sys_id = prompt('Please, enter the sys_id of the record to be found');
			}
			if(sys_id != null)
				window.open('/GlobalSearch.do?sys_id='+sys_id,'_blank');
		}
	</script>
</j:jelly>]]></html><name>searchSysId</name><processing_script/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-23 16:20:31</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>72a22b754f631200b608a6928110c729</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>searchSysId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_page_72a22b754f631200b608a6928110c729</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-05-23 16:23:10</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_page></record_update>
